1175600.name: The Wilds of Dacrima: Field Notes from a Poorly Supervised Alchemist and his Unruly Clockwork Companion
1175600.description:
Welcome to The Wilds of Dacrima: Field Notes from a Poorly Supervised Alchemist and his Unruly Robot Companion, a first-person fantasy adventure puzzler about the blazing pursuit of alchemy and friendship.

A plague known as 'The Great Rot' has ravaged all things living. It's up to you, legendary Alchemist Professor Edric Tayte, to discover a cure.

Alongside your sidekick robot, venture through the weird and wonderful world of Dacrima, collect its fabled flora and fauna, and brew a roster of potent Potions. With each new ability gained, explore the deepest depths of the forest, with plenty of secrets to find along the way...


Forage Through The Wilds of Dacrima

Explore enchanting landscapes rich in resources: absurd animals, peculiar plants, and miraculous minerals. Scan your discoveries to unlock lore, potion details, and piece together the mystery of the forest. Uncover ways to traverse obstacles, gain access to new areas, and complete quests along the way!

Brew New Abilities

You are an alchemist after all, combine the wondrous ingredients you find throughout The Wilds of Dacrima to brew new Potions (and hopefully a cure for that blasted Great Rot).

With each Potion unlocked, you gain new abilities and discover new ways of venturing through the Wilds.

Jump On Your Sidekick's Head

Exploring is hard work when you’re approaching 70. Your robot companion L-P1N is your travel guide, best friend, and very own placeable platform.

L-P1N is the stowaway you never knew you needed. A tool in Edric’s arsenal, who may just become a friend, your confidant, and the one thing in this place that isn’t trying to kill you (maybe).

A Whacky Adventure

Strap in for this turbulent ride through the dark corners, bright sunlight, and unlikely humour.

Enjoy the world, puzzles, and mysteries of The Wilds of Dacrima: Field Notes from a Poorly Supervised Alchemist and his Unruly Robot Companion!
